full_summary:
================zę

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Office Chairs for PrairiesCan

**Notice Title**
---------------

Office Chairs for PrairiesCan

**Reference Number**
------------------

cb-104-47542273

**Amendment Number**
------------------

5

**Notice Type**
---------------

Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Purchase Method**
------------------

Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Tender Details

*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Solicitation Number**: 4W002-240159
*   **Publication Date**: January 18, 2024
*   **Bid Closing Date**: February 9, 2024, 4:00 p.m. MST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
*   **Location**: Edmonton, Alberta

### Description

PrairiesCan requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office chairs to Edmonton (Alberta) by March 25th, 2024. This bid solicitation is issued in accordance with PWGSC Supply Arrangement # E60PQ-120001/H and covers the same requirements as the product sub-categories 1 outlined in the SA:

*   **Product Sub-Category**: Rotary chairs and stools

This bid will be solicited amongst the PSIB Suppliers (SA holders). Interested suppliers must submit a bid following the instructions outlined in the RFP document.

### Requirements

*   The contract is for the supply of office chairs
*   Delivery is to Edmonton, Alberta, on or before March 25th, 2024
*   Installation is also required
*   Award of contract will be based on lowest price
*   This requirement does not include any security requirements

### How to Respond

If you are interested in submitting a bid, please refer to the attached RFP documents for complete details and requirements. Interested suppliers can access the original RFP documents and necessary instructions in the links below.


Attachments:
------------

*   [RFP Document #1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29810/rfp_prairiescan---office-chairs---en.pdf)
*   [RFP Document #2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29810/rfp_p
